html: Did you know that #OnThisDay in the year 1980, Prakash Padukone became the first Indian to ever win the All England Badminton Championships? He defeated Indonesia's Liem Swie King 15-3, 15-10 and #Badminton for India was never the same again. #FlashbackFridaypic.twitter.com/nBa0vD5KUf
text:
Did you know that #OnThisDay in the year 1980, Prakash Padukone became the first Indian to ever win the All England Badminton Championships?
He defeated  Indonesia's Liem Swie King 15-3, 15-10 and #Badminton for India was never the same again. #FlashbackFridaypic.twitter.com/nBa0vD5KUf

html: #Empathy is a human emotion that enables us to understand each other. More often, empathy & #sympathy are used interchangeably. Empathy requires you to envision & feel emotions felt by others. #Love | #YouAreNotAlone | #MentalHealthMatters | #AtoZOfDepressionpic.twitter.com/6RlHZpV5we
text:
#Empathy is a human emotion that enables us to understand each other. More often, empathy & #sympathy are used interchangeably. Empathy requires you to envision & feel emotions felt by others. 

#Love | #YouAreNotAlone | #MentalHealthMatters | #AtoZOfDepressionpic.twitter.com/6RlHZpV5we

While depression & anxiety are two different diagnoses in the field of mental health, they are often diagnosed together. #Anxiety can cause individuals to experience immense fear, preventing them from performing tasks that are otherwise comfortable. #MentalWellness #MentalHealthpic.twitter.com/YfneyqY99t
text:
